name: Prudence Shipp
bio: When Prudence Shipp was born on 11 February 1811, in Caldwell, Kentucky, United States, her father, Joseph Shipp, was 26 and her mother, Sophia Thompson, was 24. She married Thomas B. Bennett on 3 April 1828, in Butler, Alabama, United States. They were the parents of at least 7 sons and 7 daughters. She lived in Election Precinct 14 Georgiana, Butler, Alabama, United States in 1860 and Garland, Butler, Alabama, United States in 1880. She died in Alabama, United States.
